questList.questDescription: The chilling whispers of Frigidra the Spectral Whisperer echo through the Frostbite Caverns. Will you silence the whispers or seek an alliance with the spectral being?
Forge a pact with Cryotar the Soulbound, the protector of the Frozen Soul Drake, to gain the amulet of healing.
Confront Pyroxis the Frostflame and claim the amulet of alliance as a token of victory.
Navigate the Umbral Thicket and decide the fate of Nihilus the Void Reaper, the silent soul drainer lurking in the shadows.
Harmonize with Umbraxis the Twilight Wyrm, the guardian of the Shadowed Lindwurm, to receive the amulet of healing.
Reach the end of the Umbral Thicket and face Scorchflame the Shadow Infernal to claim the amulet of alliance.
Embark on a journey through the fractured wall platforms and confront Zyralith the Wraith, the legendary Void Stalker, to claim victory and restore balance to the Ethereal Abyss.
Seek out Soulwarden the Void Sentinel, the guardian of the Ethereal Ushabti, and unite for the amulet of healing.
Face Dreadmaw the Shadow Devourer in the fiery depths of the Ethereal Abyss to earn the amulet of alliance.
